title: Ghidra does not display whole strings
content:
It's pretty annoying. I think I might have changed some setting somewhere.



Here's a screenshot of what I'm talking about. See all those "..." ?

How do I turn that off?

answers_data.content:
You need to edit the field width.

First, click the "Edit the Listing fields" button:



Then, drag the "Field Name" border to the right until the text is fully displayed:

comments.text: Welp, that was rather simple. Thank you.
Some string values are still too long for this to work, is there any alternative to this solution?
